contactDescription: Fill out the form to inquire your question about your favourite event.
subject: Subject
privacy_rights_des1: This Privacy Policy applies to the sites and apps where it appears.
privacy_rights_des2: This Policy describes how we treat personal information we collect both online and offline. This includes on our websites and in our apps. It also includes at our box offices or in phone or email interactions you have with us. If you live in Canada, please read our Canadian Privacy Policy.
privacy_rights_des3: Our Privacy Notice has been designed with you in mind. How the notice applies to you will depend on the way in which you interact with us. For example, if you:
privacy_rights_des4: Purchase a ticket from us, we will use the information you provide us to fulfill our obligations to you in delivering that service, and, where permitted, keep you up to date about other events that may be of interest to you; and
privacy_rights_des5: When you browse our sites, we use cookies to tailor your experience and hopefully provide you with a seamless experience. Your choices and rights under each scenario are explained in more detail below. Click on 'Learn More' under each icon for more information or scroll down to read the full policy.

eventListingPageDescription: Our event listings cover a wide spectrum of interests. From music concerts and art exhibitions to sports tournaments and community gatherings, there's something for everyone
contactUsPageDescription: Get in Touch - We're Here to Help! Welcome to our Contact Us page, your direct link to our dedicated support and assistance. We're committed to providing you with the best experience possible, and we're here to address any questions, concerns, or feedback you may have.
aboutUsPageDescription: Who We Are - Your Trusted Source for Unforgettable Experiences Welcome to the heart and soul of our platform, the 'About Us' page. At Eventmania, we're more than just an event booking website we're a passionate community dedicated to enriching your life through exciting and unforgettable experiences
checkoutPageDescription: Secure Checkout - Complete Your Event Experience Welcome to our Checkout page, the final step in securing your spot at the event of your dreams. This is where your event adventure becomes a reality. Our secure and user-friendly checkout process ensures that your journey to unforgettable experiences is as seamless as possible.
paymentProcessingMessageLine1: We're checking your payment status with the payment provider, which can take anywhere from 1 minute to 30 minutes.
paymentProcessingMessageLine2: In some cases, it may take up to 24 hours. If it takes longer, please contact support by clicking here.
somethingWrongMsg: Oops! Something unexpected happened. Please try again later.

refundErrorPopupCybersourceMessage: The booking was made through the Cybersource payment gateway, so you need to initiate the :type directly from the Cybersource dashboard. Once the refund is processed, you can then mark the booking as :type here.

refundTicketLine3: Customers will no longer be able to scan this ticket.
partialRefundTicketLine1: This action will forcefully change the ticket status to :refundStatus requiring you to manually complete the refund process from the respective payment gateway dashboard. Once the refund is successful, update the status here.

deletePreSellNotice:
This action will do the following:
1. Delete all pre-sell tickets that have not been scanned or sold.
2. Impact the numbers in the reports accordingly.
This action cannot be undone.
